name: Oasis Keepers
description:
Description

You have an oasis. You must take care of it.

Avoid the scorpions and get the most of your animals and plants in this arcade style game about taking care of your oasis!

Controls (Keyboard only)
MovementUse Object
Release Object
Player 1
Arrow keys
SpaceAlt (Only with 1 player)Player 2
WASDCtrl
